<!-------------------------->

This webpage together with its associated github repository (https://github.com/JGCRI/gcam_training) is meant to serve as a single location to host training materials and guides for GCAM and GCAM Eco-system tools. The materials here are meant to supplement the official documentation for GCAM that can be found at http://jgcri.github.io/gcam-doc/.
